articles.title: Meta says it will use public content from European users to train its AI model
articles.description: Meta is the owner of popular social platforms Facebook and Instagram, as well as messaging app WhatsApp.
articles.content:
SOCIAL MEDIA COMPANY Meta has said that it will start using publicly available content from European users to train its artificial intelligence models.
The company, which owns Facebook and Instagram, as well as popular messaging app WhatsApp, said it... [1879 chars]

articles.title: Meta faces historic antitrust trial that could force it to break off Instagram, WhatsApp
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — A historic antitrust trial began Monday for Meta Platforms Inc.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) — A historic antitrust trial began Monday for Meta Platforms Inc. in a case that could force the tech giant to break off Instagram and WhatsApp, startups it bought more than a decade ago that have since grown into social media powerho... [5849 chars]
